data.eml:eml: On Macrothrix agsensis Dumont, Silva-Briano & Babu, 2002 (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Macrothricidae), with description of the male and ephippial females, and comments on the distribution of the genus in Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garfias-Espejo, Tania, Elías-Gutiérrez, Manuel, Silva-Briano, Marcelo (2007): On Macrothrix agsensis Dumont, Silva-Briano & Babu, 2002 (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Macrothricidae), with description of the male and ephippial females, and comments on the distribution of the genus in Mexico. Zootaxa 1632: 49-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179442
